import styles from './Edit.module.css' import * as carService from '../../services/carService.js' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const categories = [ { value: 'cabriolet-car', text: 'Cabriolet' }, { value: 'small-car', text: 'Small Car' }, { value: 'suv/off-road', text: 'SUV/Off-road' }, { value: 'estate', text: 'Estate Car' }, { value: 'saloon', text: 'Saloon' }, { value: 'coupe', text: 'Sports Car/Couper' }, { value: 'van', text: 'Van' }, ] const fuels = [ { value: 'petrol', text: 'Petrol' }, { value: 'diesel', text: 'Diesel' }, { value: 'electric', text: 'Electric' }, { value: 'lpg', text: 'LPG' }, { value: 'hybrid', text: 'Hybrid' }, { value: 'hydrogen', text: 'Hydrogen' }, ] const gearboxes = [ { value: 'manual', text: 'Manual' }, { value: 'semi-automatic', text: 'Semi-automatic' }, { value: 'automatic', text: 'Automatic' }, ] const Edit = ({ match }) => { const carId = match.params.carId const [car, setCar] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { carService.getOne(carId) .then(result => { setCar(result) }) }, [carId]) const carEditSumbitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } const onChangeCategoryHandler = (e, fuel) => { e.preventDefault() setCar(state => ({ ...state, fuel: e.target.value })) } return (

Edit Ad

); } export default Edit;
